content: The "Rate Payer Recovery Act of 2007" may provide disaster assistance for power transmission and distribution facilities. The Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act now includes a definition for "private or investor-owned power facility" as a privately-owned transmission or distribution facility providing electric or natural gas service to retail customers. This definition also covers leased facilities. The Robert T. This definition is part of the conditions for contributions under the Act.
